for i in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = 1
    j = 0
    o = 0
    while j < len(l):
        if i == l[i - 1]:
            l.insert(i - 1, i + 1)
            o += 1
        i += 1
        j += 1
    print(o)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    count = 0
    i = 0
    while i in range(len(A)):
        if A[i] == i + 1:
            count = count + 1
            A.insert(i, len(A) + i + count)
        i = i + 1
    print(count)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    i = 0
    insert_count = 0
    while i < len(A):
        if A[i] == i + 1:
            A.insert(i, (i + 1) % 10)
            insert_count += 1
            i += 1
        i += 1
    print(insert_count)

def solve(n, lst):
    i = 0
    c = 0
    while i < n:
        if i + 1 == lst[i]:
            lst.insert(i, i + 1)
            n += 1
            c += 1
        i += 1
    print(c)
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    lst = list(map(int, input().split()))
    solve(n, lst)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    add = 1
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        pos = i + add
        if a[i] == pos:
            ans += 1
            add += 1
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
while t:
    t = t - 1
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    isTrue = True
    c = 0
    coun = 0
    for i in range(0, 2 * n):
        if coun < len(a):
            if a[i] == i + 1:
                c += 1
                a.insert(i, 2 * n + 1)
            coun += 1
    print(c)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    t = t - 1
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    j = 1
    count = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if x[i] != j:
            j = j + 1
        else:
            j = j + 2
            count = count + 1
    print(count)
